title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook

```{r}

library(janitor)

library(tidyverse)

mobiles <- read_csv("data/20190928-items.csv") %>% 
  clean_names()

head(mobiles)
```

```{r}
mobiles <- mobiles %>% 
  select(brand, title, rating, total_reviews)
```

```{r}
mobiles %>% 
  group_by(brand) %>% 
  summarise(no_of_phones = n()) %>% 
  slice_max(no_of_phones, n = 1)
```

```{r}
mobiles_sum_stats <- mobiles %>% 
  filter(brand == "Samsung") %>% 
  summarise(
    num = n(),
    mean = mean(rating),
    sd = sd(rating)
  )

mobiles_sum_stats
```
```{r}
mobiles %>%
  filter(brand == "Samsung") %>% 
summary()
```

```{r}
mobiles %>% 
  filter(brand == "Samsung") %>% 
  ggplot()+
  aes(x = rating) + 
  geom_histogram(aes(y = ..density..), col = "white", bins = 25)
```
